thread.title_full: Istonish and Dizzion Partner to Offer Hosted Virtual Desktop (VDI) Solutions

author: Debbie Josendale
title: Istonish and Dizzion Partner to Offer Hosted Virtual Desktop (VDI) Solutions
text:
Istonish, Inc. recently announced a new partnership agreement with Dizzion, Inc., a full service Cloud Delivered Desktop as a Service provider. This new partnership will allow Istonish to offer a company’s employees the ability to access their applications and data securely, from any device, anytime, anywhere while escalating Dizzion’s sales distribution channel. The market for desktop virtualization is expected to grow to $5.6 billion by 2016 as many companies begin to move away from hardware-based computing to virtualization and the cloud.
“Our clients are focused on reducing systems management overhead while increasing user mobility and security,” said Rod Taylor, Chief Operating Officer for Istonish. “The Dizzion/Istonish partnership allows us to combine Dizzion’s Enterprise Class Virtual Desktop solution with Istonish’s comprehensive Infrastructure and Security Managed Services. This will ensure our customer’s critical systems are available to their users and protected from outside threats.”
“We’re extremely pleased to be working with Istonish,” said Steve Prather, CEO of Dizzion. “Their solid reputation for managed services and dedication to customer support are fully aligned with Dizzion’s mission: ‘to redefine the way the world works.’ The Dizzion/Istonish partnership will ensure that as businesses migrate to a managed service model, their data will remain secure and their IT departments will be freed to focus on higher-priority, value-add projects.”
About Istonish, Inc.
Celebrating 25 years in business, Istonish is an award winning technology service provider. Based in Denver, CO, service offerings include Infrastructure and Security Managed Services, Hosted IVR/ Third Party Verification Contact Center, Help Desk and Consulting. Istonish has established itself as a company with a strong foundation in community involvement and valued client relationships. To learn more please visit http://www.Istonish.com .
About Dizzion
Dizzion is redefining the way the world works by bringing the immense power of cloud computing to the end user with its high-performance, proprietary managed desktop service. Dizzion delivers enterprise technology that includes infrastructure, software licensing, management, support and security.
